DIA_Cabi_SQ311_LetsGo_03_01: Did the mine boss really start making money on the side with royal salt?
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_LetsGo_15_02: Yes. Now we just have to prove it.
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_LetsGo_03_03: That's great. So we're going to the mine?
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_LetsGo_Teleport_15_01: Let's go as soon as we can.
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_LetsGo_Later_15_01: I have to get ready. I'll meet you there.
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_FOLLOWME_15_03: We enter the mine and grab the miner Malen. If we make quick work of it, we can also look for other evidence of Lewko's activities.
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_WrongWay_03_01: I think the mine is in the other direction. Once you decide where you want to go, let us know, we'll be waiting around here.
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_AfterFight_03_01: Damn, what the hell happened here! When we started questioning the miners, those guards just pounced on us!
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_AfterFight_03_02: Fortunately, the workers were on our side, so we managed to win.
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_AfterFight_03_05: Something makes me feel that you might get a promotion, and certainly a raise, for uncovering such machinations!
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_AfterFight_03_06: The guild will have another reason to brag, eh? Royal guards making money on the side while honest mercenaries support the workers?
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_AfterFight_15_07: Well, someone has to keep this island in order.
DIA_Cabi_SQ311_GoReport_03_01: Shouldn't you go report to the city?
DIA_Cabi_Hello_03_01: Depends on what order I get. If Winstan says 'Cabi, you're on guard', I go on guard, if he says something else, I do something else.
DIA_Cabi_Ambient_03_01: Just as I suspected. The service is completely unprofitable - the pay doesn't even reward half the amount of tedious duties I have here.
DIA_Cabi_Ambient_03_02: Those events at the mine were the most exciting adventure I've ever had. But I don't think I want a repeat anyway.
DIA_Cabi_Ambient_03_03: You still ask? After our king's brilliant idea with dresses instead of armor?
